Moiz_Userguide.Title: Moiz Cleaansing Lotioon
Moiz_Userguide.Heading: Extra Gentle For Sensitive Skin
Moiz_Userguide.Contents: Sodium Cocoyl Appl Amino Acids, Decyl Glucoside, Caprylic Capric Triglyceride
Moiz_Userguide.description: Offers a blend of Sulphate free surfactants with excellent foam texture, superior foaming ability and stability even in extreme conditions.
